resources.string: Thank you for taking this test. Your results have been sent to the recruiter.
What are some challenges you have faced while working in a team? To answer your question press Record to transcribe audio.
Looks like this is your first time using CLVR!
If a company referred you to CLVR, please state the company name as well as the password provided by them
Welcome! You are about to take a test as part of a job recruitment process. You will need to speak into your device for each question and you need to answer every question.
It is highly recommended you take this test while connected to Wi-Fi as some things can be data intensive. So make sure you\'re connected and good luck!
